benchmark_details.name: PACT (Personality-driven Argumentation-based Negotiation Conversations for Tourism)
benchmark_details.overview: The PACT dataset is introduced to support the Personality-driven Argumentation-based Negotiation Dialogue Generation (PAN-DG) task, consisting of over 8,000 personality-driven negotiation dialogues within the tourism sector, generated using large language models.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance negotiation dialogue systems in the tourism sector through argumentation techniques and personality profile integration.

data.source: Automatically generated using Large Language Models with human oversight through a multi-stage pipeline.
data.annotation: Automatically generated with human filtering for quality assurance.

methods: Mixture of experts for quality assessment
methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on evaluations by human annotators and automated scoring methods.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores in metrics indicate better alignment with negotiation dynamics, personality relevance, and conversation quality.
methodology.baseline_results: Strong baselines established with various large language models for sub-tasks in the PAN-DG task.
methodology.validation: Extensive manual and automated evaluations across multiple tasks.

harm: Bias from using web-sourced training data

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: The dataset is synthetically generated but requires user discretion to avoid cultural insensitivity.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: This study was reviewed and approved by the Institutional Review Board (IRB).
